name: Muslim Monster Marriage
description:
!!!PLEASE DON'T DONATE ANYTHING THIS IS JUST A PROLOGUE AT THE MOMENT OH MY GOSH!!!

A dating sim... except I lied and it's not a dating sim. 

Step into the world of a Muslim woman navigating her way through the ups and downs of her first ever marriage. 

Including:

  • Five unique monster men to woo - each one focusing on a different struggle within the Muslim, and generally ethnic, community
  • A nameable MC
  • A compendium equipped with a glossary and a tab for general context, for those of us who need a little help or friendly reminder
  • 6 CGs to collect per route
  • No bad endings (because I'm a hater of permanent angst)
